title: 传送枪mod打上之后游戏就打不开。
author: logo.exe
txt_content: 一打开游戏就出现：Forge Mod Loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation. The mod and versions listed below could not be found. Forge:minmum version required is 10.13.2.1291. The file 'ForgeModLoader-client-0.log' contains more information.

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
更新一下你的forge
最低要求10.13.2.1291
